Home

Hello my name is Luca Bertozzi, I have a master degree in Theoretical Physics and I have always been passionate about computers, programming, FOSS, information security and privacy.

This is the homepage of my blog where I try to post monthly on my projects with computers, malware, vulnerabilities and, occasionaly, life in general.

Other than computers I like cooking, sailing and travelling.
